name: uncloud
description: Uncloud is a self-hosted centralized cloud account manager that aggregates multiple cloud storage providers, giving a unified view and operations from a single web interface.

features.title: Cloud Storage
features.description: Connect multiple cloud storage providers like Google Drive, Dropbox, and OneDrive

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Access all cloud accounts through a single web interface without switching between services

features.title: File Browsing
features.description: Browse files across all connected cloud storage providers in one consolidated view

features.title: File Operations
features.description: Perform file operations like copy, move, and delete across different cloud providers

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Search for files across all connected cloud storage accounts from one search box

features.title: Transfer Management
features.description: Move files between different cloud providers without downloading locally
